problem: 如图,AD,AE,BC分别切⊙O于点D,E,F,若△ABC的周长为24,则AD的长是()
answer: 解:据切线长定理有AD=AE,BD=BF,CE=CF；则△ABC的周长=AB+BC+AC=AB+BF+CF+AC=AB+BD+AC+CE=AD+AE=2AD,∵△ABC的周长为24,∴AD=12,故选:C．
comment: 本题考查的是切线长定理,分析图形时关键是要仔细探索,找出图形的各对相等切线长．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AD, AE, BC tangent ⊙O to points D, E, F respectively. If the perimeter of △ABC is N_0, then the length of AD is ()
